author: Associated Press
title: Dog-walking ban sparks outrage in Serbia...
description: Dog-walking ban sparks outrage in Serbia... (Third column, 17th story, link ) Related stories: DEFIANT: Belarus football league plays on... Sweden shuns 'drastic' response: 'Can't stay home whole day'... Not since Black Plague have Jerusalem's holy alleys fal…
content:
BELGRADE, Serbia — Pet owners in Serbia are furious over the populist government’s decision to ban even a brief walk for people with dogs during an evening curfew to contain the spread of the new coronavirus.
Angry dog owners have flooded social networks, wa… [+818 chars]
